description:
Because other OpenStack projects have APIs with extensions, the namespaces in the current submitted Nova extensions, such as http://docs.openstack.org/ext/rescue/api/v1.1, seems like it should be http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/rescue/api/v1.1

Keystone uses extensions also. We'll need unique namespaces based on projects.
title: Namespaces for Compute API 1.1 extensions need /compute/ in the URL

comments.content:
Because other OpenStack projects have APIs with extensions, the namespaces in the current submitted Nova extensions, such as http://docs.openstack.org/ext/rescue/api/v1.1, seems like it should be http://docs.openstack.org/compute/ext/rescue/api/v1.1

Keystone uses extensions also. We'll need unique namespaces based on projects.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~annegentle
